attributes.action: Allow UK Citizens not resident in the UK have a say in the departure from the EU
attributes.additional_details: I am British, I live in Europe.  I am not allowed to vote in Germany yet I am not allowed to vote as a British Citizen on such a key matter?  I have a UK pension, I am expected to pay inheritance tax upon death and who knows where I might retire.  This decision affects people like me too and we need to have a say in the process.
attributes.background: British people living abroad were NOT allowed a Brexit vote and are hugely impacted by it.  We form a constituency of people who live a special way of life in the EU - the life that experiences free movement of labour and we well understand free trade benefits.  An important voice was not heard.

rejection.details:
It's not clear what you mean by "have a say in the departure". There are several petitions already open on the site about voting rights for UK citizens overseas. You might like to sign one of these, for example:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/129550

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/121742

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/137601
